metadata.title: CVE-2009-3850 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Blender 2.34, 2.35a, 2.40, and 2.49b allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a .blend file that contains Python statements in the onLoad action of a ScriptLink SDNA.

criterions.comment: blender package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
